entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' during 'Morph - Global' #110960
  • arm64: Assertion failed 'loop->ContainsBlock(pred)' during 'Do value numbering' #110959
  • Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg->HasFlag(BBF_DONT_REMOVE)' during 'Remove empty try-catch-fault 2/3 #110958
  • Assertion failed 'Contains(ancestor) && Contains(descendant)' during 'SSA: liveness' #110957
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg->HasFlag(BBF_DONT_REMOVE)' in during 'Remove empty try/catch/fault' #110954
    10.0.0
  • [Mono/linux-arm64] int32_t CryptoNative_EvpPKeyBits(EVP_PKEY *): Assertion `pkey != NULL' failed. #110952
  • HttpClient may leak UnobservedTaskException in CheckUsabilityOnScavenge #110951
  • Creation of arrays with negative lengths? #110949
  • [API Proposal]: IReadOnlyMemoryOwner<T> to indicate buffer ownership and provide read-only access #110947

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Implement Read short, int, long and their unsigned versions to stream #110944
  • CultureInfo.TextInfo.IsRightToLeft returns false for Uyghur culture in Blazor WebAssembly #110015
  • ParameterInfo.ToString() is inconsistent with the .NET Framework behavior #110447
  • where `DISABLE_ASSERT_MESSAGES` defined #110941
  • Add ref for folders that are missing one #27762
    Future
  • Unable to execute setcap related programs or functions in .net programs #110946
  • Add managed views of the EE datastructures like MethodTable #10373
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some paramrefs #110956
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Clean up in Number.Formatting.cs #110955
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove redundant 'unsafe' context #110953
    area-Meta
  • Delete unnecessary #pragma warning disable #110948
    area-System.Linq

Merged

  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code clean up around TryWriteBigEndian/TryWriteLittleEndian #110897
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize struct parameter register accesses in the backend #110819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: split loop headers that are also try entries #110880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Unify Swift parameter register homing with normal homing #110859
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for generic span casting #109136
    area-Meta, community-contribution
